pages.title: Hard Light Block
pages.text: The crystal altars primary purpose is to enhance simple crystals into basic magical gems, but that's not all it's good for! With various dusts and catalysts many other useful things can be done with the table.
As an example, pure blocks of solidified light can be made! Crafted hard light blocks will be permanent regardless if the spell variants are or not.
Blue ice makes for a fantastic skating rink, but with a little magic, it can be made even better! Glistening ice is more slippery than blue ice, and it's useful in magical recipes.
More alchemy than simple enhancing, the altar can cure the rotten flesh of fallen undead, converting it into a more useable leathery product.
Shine lights combine all the sunny characteristics of the sunflower with the literal glowing magic of glowstone dust into a compact and convenient light source.
